verses.name: Revelation 16:4
verses.text: And the third angel poured out his vial upon the rivers and fountains of waters; and they became blood.

verses.name: Revelation 16:5
verses.text: And I heard the angel of the waters say, Thou art righteous, O Lord, which art, and wast, and shalt be, because thou hast judged thus.

verses.name: Revelation 16:6
verses.text: For they have shed the blood of saints and prophets, and thou hast given them blood to drink; for they are worthy.

verses.name: Revelation 16:7
verses.text: And I heard another out of the altar say, Even so, Lord God Almighty, true and righteous are thy judgments.
